languages.text: "Похвальная мотивация, но никуда не годное исполнение. В следующий раз доверьте задачу трактовки своего долга перед Императором сотруднику Инквизиции подле вас. Иначе рискуете очень сильно задолжать".

"Your intentions are admirable, but your execution leaves much to be desired. Next time, entrust the task of interpreting your Emperor-given duty to the officer of the Inquisition standing beside you. Or else you will find yourself owing a great deal more than your duty."
languages.original_text: "Похвальная мотивация, но никуда не годное исполнение. В следующий раз доверьте задачу трактовки своего долга перед Императором сотруднику Инквизиции подле вас. Иначе рискуете очень сильно задолжать".

"Your intentions are admirable, but your execution leaves much to be desired. Next time, entrust the task of interpreting your Emperor-given duty to the officer of the Inquisition standing beside you. Or else you will find yourself owing a great deal more than your duty."

"Your intentions are admirable, but your execution leaves much to be desired. Next time, entrust the task of interpreting your Emperor-given duty to the officer of the Inquisition standing beside you. Or else you will find yourself owing a great deal more than your duty."

"Your intentions are admirable, but your execution leaves much to be desired. Next time, entrust the task of interpreting your Emperor-given duty to the officer of the Inquisition standing beside you. Or else you will find yourself owing a great deal more than your duty."

languages.text: “你的动机令人钦佩，但你的执行能力还有待提高。等到下次，请让你身边这位来自审判庭的官员负责解释帝皇赋予你的职责，否则你会发现，你欠下的债务比履行的职责要多得多。”
languages.original_text: "Your intentions are admirable, but your execution leaves much to be desired. Next time, entrust the task of interpreting your Emperor-given duty to the officer of the Inquisition standing beside you. Or else you will find yourself owing a great deal more than your duty."

traits.locale_text: “你的动机令人钦佩，但你的执行能力还有待提高。等到下次，请让你身边这位来自审判庭的官员负责解释帝皇赋予你的职责，否则你会发现，你欠下的债务比履行的职责要多得多。”

languages.text: «Aunque sus intenciones son admirables, la ejecución deja mucho que desear. La próxima vez, encomiende la tarea de interpretar el deber que el Emperador le encomienda al representante de la Inquisición que tiene a su lado. De lo contrario, tendrá asuntos mucho más importantes de los que ocuparse que su deber».
languages.original_text: "Your intentions are admirable, but your execution leaves much to be desired. Next time, entrust the task of interpreting your Emperor-given duty to the officer of the Inquisition standing beside you. Or else you will find yourself owing a great deal more than your duty."

traits.locale_text: «Aunque sus intenciones son admirables, la ejecución deja mucho que desear. La próxima vez, encomiende la tarea de interpretar el deber que el Emperador le encomienda al representante de la Inquisición que tiene a su lado. De lo contrario, tendrá asuntos mucho más importantes de los que ocuparse que su deber».

languages.text: 「その意図は称賛に値する。しかしお前の仕事ぶりには不十分な点も多い。次回より、皇帝から授かった職務の解釈は、お前のそばに立つ異端審問庁の職員に任せよ。さもなくば、職務よりも負担が多いと気づくことになるぞ」
languages.original_text: "Your intentions are admirable, but your execution leaves much to be desired. Next time, entrust the task of interpreting your Emperor-given duty to the officer of the Inquisition standing beside you. Or else you will find yourself owing a great deal more than your duty."

traits.locale_text: 「その意図は称賛に値する。しかしお前の仕事ぶりには不十分な点も多い。次回より、皇帝から授かった職務の解釈は、お前のそばに立つ異端審問庁の職員に任せよ。さもなくば、職務よりも負担が多いと気づくことになるぞ」

languages.original_text: "Your intentions are admirable, but your execution leaves much to be desired. Next time, entrust the task of interpreting your Emperor-given duty to the officer of the Inquisition standing beside you. Or else you will find yourself owing a great deal more than your duty."

languages.text: "Eure Absichten sind lobenswert, aber Eure Umsetzung lässt einiges zu wünschen übrig. Vertraut nächstes Mal die Aufgabe der Interpretation Eurer vom Imperator aufgetragenen Pflicht dem Offizier der Inquisition an, der neben Euch steht. Anderenfalls werdet Ihr deutlich mehr schuldig bleiben als Eure Pflicht."
languages.original_text: "Your intentions are admirable, but your execution leaves much to be desired. Next time, entrust the task of interpreting your Emperor-given duty to the officer of the Inquisition standing beside you. Or else you will find yourself owing a great deal more than your duty."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Absichten sind lobenswert, aber Eure Umsetzung lässt einiges zu wünschen übrig. Vertraut nächstes Mal die Aufgabe der Interpretation Eurer vom Imperator aufgetragenen Pflicht dem Offizier der Inquisition an, der neben Euch steht. Anderenfalls werdet Ihr deutlich mehr schuldig bleiben als Eure Pflicht."

languages.text: « Vos intentions sont louables, mais vos méthodes laissent à désirer. La prochaine fois, à moins que vous n'ayez l'ambition de vous attirer les foudres de l'Empereur, je ne saurai que trop vous recommander de laisser l'interprétation de vos devoirs envers Sa personne à l'officier de l'Inquisition qui se tient à vos côtés. »
languages.original_text: "Your intentions are admirable, but your execution leaves much to be desired. Next time, entrust the task of interpreting your Emperor-given duty to the officer of the Inquisition standing beside you. Or else you will find yourself owing a great deal more than your duty."

traits.locale_text: « Vos intentions sont louables, mais vos méthodes laissent à désirer. La prochaine fois, à moins que vous n'ayez l'ambition de vous attirer les foudres de l'Empereur, je ne saurai que trop vous recommander de laisser l'interprétation de vos devoirs envers Sa personne à l'officier de l'Inquisition qui se tient à vos côtés. »

languages.text: "Niyetin takdire şayan ancak uygulamada iyi bir iş çıkardığın söylenemez. Bir dahaki sefere sana İmparator tarafından bahşedilen görevin ne olduğunun yorumlamasını, yanındaki Engizisyon subayına bırak. Yoksa görevini yerine getirememiş olmaktan daha büyük sorunlarla karşılaşırsın."
languages.original_text: "Your intentions are admirable, but your execution leaves much to be desired. Next time, entrust the task of interpreting your Emperor-given duty to the officer of the Inquisition standing beside you. Or else you will find yourself owing a great deal more than your duty."

traits.locale_text: "Niyetin takdire şayan ancak uygulamada iyi bir iş çıkardığın söylenemez. Bir dahaki sefere sana İmparator tarafından bahşedilen görevin ne olduğunun yorumlamasını yanında duran Engizisyon subayına danış. Yoksa görevini yerine getirememiş olmaktan daha büyük sorunlarla karşılaşırsın."
